greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n in which any two distinct parts differ by at least 6.
comment: Also number of partitions of n in which each part, with the possible exception of the largest, occurs at least 6 times.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 04 2012
